6. Locate the 'yards' column data for the selected player from the identified row. The value for Kevin Nickerson is 73 yards.
7. Check if the extracted value (73 yards) equals the specified threshold (74 yards). To do this, compare 73 == 74. In this case, the result of the comparison is false.
8. Since the selected player's total yards (73 yards) does not equal 74 yards, we have to conclude that the claim is not entirely accurate because it mentions "a 74 yard," but Kevin Nickerson has only 73 yards. However, the part of the claim regarding the 'long' value is correct.
